title: Klimatväktaren — Climate Monitoring Device
description: Custom hardware-software system developed for If Insurance to monitor climate conditions in Swedish municipalities. Built the IoT device using Raspberry Pi and developed the backend in Python with Django. Real-time data is visualized via a dashboard for municipal adaptation strategies.

title: Routte — Last-Mile Delivery Optimization Platform
description: Co-founded Routte, a startup focused on optimizing last-mile delivery for small and medium-sized businesses. Designed and built a full-stack platform enabling route planning, dispatching, communication, and real-time delivery tracking. Helped businesses improve operational efficiency and customer satisfaction.

title: Custom FPV Drones — Designed, Built, and Flown
description: Over the past few years, I've designed, built, and flown multiple FPV drones ranging from 2.5" to 4" — all fully custom. My process combines open-source tools like FreeCAD, OpenSCAD,  with 3D printing, structural analysis, and hardware sourced from global suppliers. I design my own frames with mechanical stress considerations, aiming for high performance in freestyle and cinematic flight.

title: Guilliman — Indie App for Automated Financial Health
description: Guilliman is a personal finance automation app built to run my own financial life. It automatically classifies transactions, tracks daily expenses, and analyzes spending habits based on the 50/30/20 rule. Powered by a custom machine learning model, it provides contextual insights and alerts — all wrapped in a native mobile app built from scratch as a solo indie project.

title: NN Engine — Custom Neural Network Engine from Scratch
description: A neural network engine built entirely from scratch using JavaScript and TypeScript, featuring matrix-based computation, backpropagation, batch training, activation functions like ReLU and Sigmoid, and loss functions like MSE and Cross-Entropy. Designed to deepen my understanding of deep learning internals and serve as a minimal educational playground.

title: Kaggle Projects — Applied Machine Learning & Experiments
description: A collection of notebooks, data science experiments, and ML competitions explored on Kaggle. Focus areas include data preprocessing, feature engineering, model tuning, and evaluation. Used as a sandbox to test ideas and sharpen practical skills in applied ML.
